about_the_game:
Quickly find and grab balls scattered all over the map, throw them directly at your opponents and dodge theirs.
Use smartly all the different type of balls & their powers to your advantage.
Use the terrain to bounce your ball in order to surprise your ennemies.

Includes:


  • Various Maps.
  • Highly customizable Game Modes.
  • Unique balls each with their own caracteristics, physics & special power.
detailed_description:
Quickly find and grab balls scattered all over the map, throw them directly at your opponents and dodge theirs.
Use smartly all the different type of balls & their powers to your advantage.
Use the terrain to bounce your ball in order to surprise your ennemies.

Includes:


  • Various Maps.
  • Highly customizable Game Modes.
  • Unique balls each with their own caracteristics, physics & special power.
name: DodgeBall World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2130 or AMD FX 4300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti or AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Grab & throw unique balls directly at the face of your friends while dodging theirs in this FPS multiplayer game. Customize your own game modes, play in various maps & do the most insane trickshots possible in this brand new sport.
